</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

This file provides a pass which clones the current module and runs the provided pass pipeline on the clone.

The optimized module is stored into a global variable in the <code>.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/lto">llvm.lto</a></code> section. Primarily, this pass is used to support the FatLTO pipeline, but could be used to generate a bitcode section for any arbitrary pass pipeline without changing the current module.
